content:
I'd be happy to help you find a Honda dealership near you and schedule a test drive for the CR-V.

To get started, could you please provide me with your location or zip code? This will help me find dealerships in your area.

Additionally, would you like to test drive a specific trim level of the CR-V, such as the LX, EX, EX-L, or Touring? Or would you like to explore all the options?

Once I have this information, I can assist you in finding a dealership near you and scheduling a test drive at a convenient time.
